title: Castronuovo di Sicilia
description: A modern location in Sicily that has been associated with the location of the ancient settlement of Krastos.

properties.description: Location of the modern town of Castronuovo di Sicilia, thought to be in the area of the ancient settlement of Krastos, based on a representative point derived from an OpenStreetMap node
properties.title: OSM location of Castronuovo di Sicilia
